org.openlcb.implementations.throttle

Class ThrottleImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.implementations.throttle.ThrottleImplementation

  • public class ThrottleImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic Throttle implementation, a class that uses the Motive Power protocol(s) to interface with e.g. a train.
    Author:
    Bob Jacobsen Copyright 2012
